name: Final Journey (diverges)
description:
Final Journey

Under the cover of twilight the caravan departed with barely enough supplies to make the week-long journey. A silence covered the wagon, its members tense wondering if they had done enough to prepare. Their mission is simple- deliver the intel contained within the caravan to the Capital. All other forms of communication have failed. This small wagon and its two volunteers are our last hope.

Please play in fullscreen.

Credits
Miguel Sotolongo (programming/design)
Lauren Hagarty (Art, Character Design)
Cain Hung (Art)
Jacob Slone (Art)
Daniel Lee (Writing)
